title: Butchers Bridge vs Howling Abyss
body:
Butchers bridge is just so much better designed, it feels more homely to play in, it has a cool pirate announcer and so much detailing in just everything, the recently caught giant squid and hammerhead shark, the ships and sharks roaming the waters below, the cannons at first blood, all the bilgewater houses and temples. theres just so much to look at, so much to enjoy, it'll be a real shame for it to disappear and only be seen once every few years. 

so why not have it replace the howling abyss?
